summary: Dashboard enhancement: add an Alerts section below Recent Activity showing overdue territory returns and overdue tasks, with links and consistent card styling.

existing_features.title: Update the Dashboard page (frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx) to render a new section titled "Alerts" directly below the existing "Recent Activity" section, using the same spacing and card styling patterns as the rest of the Dashboard.

In the new Dashboard "Alerts" section, compute and display alert items as follows: (1) If there are any territories that are currently checked out and have been checked out for 4 months or more, display a red alert box with the text "X territories overdue for return" and a link that navigates to the Territories page. (2) If there are any tasks where dueDate is in the past and isCompleted is false, display an orange alert box with the text "X overdue tasks" and a link that navigates to the Tasks page. (3) If neither condition is present, display muted gray text "No alerts".

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an Alerts section to the Dashboard below Recent Activity showing overdue territories (>=4 months checked out) and overdue tasks (dueDate passed and not completed), with links; show 'No alerts' when none; match existing dashboard spacing/card style.

projectName: Add Alerts section to Dashboard below Recent Activity
